row.question: There are two friends A and B. A starts with his car at the speed 40 kmph. B starts one hour later from the same place, in the same direction on his bike at the speed of 50 kmph. After how many hours will they meet ?
row.rationale:
Friend A starts first , he covers the distance = 40 kmph x 1hr = 40 km
The second friend B started after 1 hour.
Relative Speed = 50 kmph - 40 kmph = 10 kmph
so, they will meet in = 40/10 = 4 hour.
ANSWER:C
